001package com.minimajack.v8.metadata.external.type;
002
003import com.minimajack.v8.metadata.external.type.impl.*;
004import com.minimajack.v8.metadata.inner.classes.V8InnerClass;
005import com.minimajack.v8.transformers.AbstractTransformer;
006import com.minimajack.v8.transformers.impl.ObjectTransformer;
007import com.minimajack.v8.utility.SerializedOutputStream;
008import com.minimajack.v8.utility.V8Reader;
009
010import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
011import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
012
013public class TypesTransformer implements AbstractTransformer<TypeValue> {
014
015  @Override
016  public TypeValue read(final ByteBuffer buffer) {
017    TypeValue readedType = new TypeValue();
018    ObjectTransformer.readBracket(buffer);
019    final String enums = V8Reader.read(String.class, buffer);
020    switch (enums) {
021      case "S": {
022        V8Reader.readChar(buffer, ',');
023        readedType.setValue( V8Reader.read(StringType.class, buffer));
024        break;
025      }
026      case "#": {
027        V8Reader.readChar(buffer, ',');
028        final InnerClassTypeValue classValue = new InnerClassTypeValue();
029        classValue.setValue(V8Reader.read(V8InnerClass.class, buffer));
030        readedType.setValue(classValue);
031        break;
032      }
033      case "B": {
034        V8Reader.readChar(buffer, ',');
035        readedType.setValue(V8Reader.read(BooleanType.class, buffer));
036        break;
037      }
038      case "U": {
039        readedType.setValue(V8Reader.read(UndefinedType.class, buffer));
040        break;
041      }
042      case "D": {
043        V8Reader.readChar(buffer, ',');
044        readedType.setValue(V8Reader.read(DateType.class, buffer));
045        break;
046      }
047      case "N": {
048        V8Reader.readChar(buffer, ',');
049        readedType.setValue(V8Reader.read(NumberType.class, buffer));
050        break;
051      }
052      case "T":
053        throw new RuntimeException("Unsupported type: " + enums);
054    }
055    ObjectTransformer.readCloseBracket(buffer);
056    return readedType;
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  public void write(Object object, SerializedOutputStream buffer) {
061    buffer.putOpenBracket();
062    var innerValue = ((TypeValue)object).getValue();
063    Class<?> clazz = innerValue.getClass();
064    if (innerValue instanceof StringType){
065      buffer.writeBytes("\"S\"".getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
066    } else if(innerValue instanceof InnerClassTypeValue){
067      buffer.writeBytes("\"#\"".getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
068    } else if(innerValue instanceof BooleanType){
069      buffer.writeBytes("\"B\"".getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
070    } else if(innerValue instanceof UndefinedType){
071      buffer.writeBytes("\"U\"".getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
072    } else if(innerValue instanceof DateType){
073      buffer.writeBytes("\"D\"".getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
074    } else if(innerValue instanceof NumberType){
075      buffer.writeBytes("\"N\"".getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
076    } else{
077      throw new RuntimeException("Unsupported type: " + innerValue.getClass());
078    }
079
080    if(!(innerValue instanceof UndefinedType)){
081      buffer.putComa();
082      if(innerValue instanceof  InnerClassTypeValue){
083        var rawInnerValue = ((InnerClassTypeValue)innerValue).getValue();
084        V8Reader.write(rawInnerValue, buffer);
085      }else {
086        V8Reader.write(innerValue, buffer);
087      }
088    }
089    buffer.putCloseBracket();
090  }
091
092}
